00040 /**
00041  * @brief  A factory class for making copy number analysis methods based on a string representation.
00042  *
00043  */
00044 class CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory
00045 {
00046 protected:
00047     std::vector<SelfDoc> m_Docs;
00048     std::vector<SelfCreate::selfCreator> m_Creators;
00049 
00050 public:
00051     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory();
00052     virtual ~CNFamilialAnalysisMethodFactory();
00053 
00054     /**
00055      * @brief  Register the method
00056      * @param const SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object
00057      * @param SelfCreate::selfCreator - The newObject function
00058      */
00059     void registerMethod(const SelfDoc& doc, SelfCreate::selfCreator maker)
00060     {
00061         m_Docs.push_back(doc);
00062         m_Creators.push_back(maker);
00063     }
00064 
00065     CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* CNFamilialAnalysisMethodForString(const std::string &spec);
00066     CNFamilialReporter* CNFamilialReporterForString(const std::string &spec);
00067 
00068     std::vector<SelfDoc> getDocs() {return m_Docs;}
00069 };
